text: The district Boards of Intermediate and Secondary Education in Bangladesh oversee the countryâ€™s education system at three levels: primary, secondary, and higher secondary. They conduct exams for the Secondary School Certificate (S.S.C) and Higher Secondary Certificate (H.S.C). They also recognize private educational institutes. Board Name Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Barisal Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Chattogram Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Cumilla Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Dhaka Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Dinajpur Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education , Jashore Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Mymensingh Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Rajshahi Board of Intermediate and Secondary Education, Sylhet Two alternative education boards: Board Name Bangladesh Madrasah Education Board Bangladesh Technical Education Board == References == Category:Education in Bangladesh
title: List of Intermediate and Secondary Education Boards in Bangladesh
